properties.description: Open from Every Tuesday from 12:00 hrs 21/02/2023. . We cater for all regardless. Disabled access and centrally located in Elgin Town centre. Under 18s welcome with a responsible Adult. Gluten free options available. We provide a public warm space where all shall receive a warm comfortable welcome. A complimentary drink, soup and roll etc are offered to all. Come in, rest up and warm outside and in. Board games etc available.
properties.title: Oasis Church and River Church warm space
